item.title: Bet
item.description: With Spike, you can now run bets. These allow users to set up wagering scenarios where all users, including the bet creator, can stand to win or lose a lot of Spike Bucks. Creating a Bet Create a bet using a command with this form: $bet Title Description of the bet :emoji: bet_amount win_amount What this wager means :emoji: bet_amount win_amount What this wager means ... Please ensure emoji get fully rendered.
